transcript:
The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji aapke paas bhi aa gaya ye call?
Executive: Haan sir namaskar kaise ho aap?
Customer: Namaskar badhiya hu mai.
Customer: Customer care ko bahut call lagaya abhi.
Executive: Sir customer care ki call bhi mujhe aati hai aur recorded line pe call hoti hai sari ki sari matlab pata ab ye hai ki customer care pe jo aapne call lagai hai na recorded line pe call hai ye sabko sunti hai. 
Executive: Theek hai ispe jo bhi abhi jo abhi humne bylead ka discussion abhi kiya tha na abhi subah hi jo hamari baat hui same discussion mujhe ab aapke sath ispe bhi karna padega jabki maine aapko bata diya tha ki mujhe sham tak ka thoda samay do aap mai karwa dunga isko.
Customer: Ab mai ye abhi abhi mai ye dekh raha hu ek reason aur dikh raha hai mujhe.
Executive: Kya dikh raha hai bataiye?
Customer: Ye total Kerala, Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu aur Chhattisgarh waha ki mere ko bylead kyu dikh rahi hai?
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Sabse jyada Tamil Nadu, Kerala, Andhra Pradesh.
Executive: Ek second bas mai ek baat na wo bol leta hu.
Customer: Wo to sir mai jab sham ko aapko call karta na leke ek bar baithta to sari cheeze mai aapko jabhi.
Executive: Solve to karte par mai ye janna chah raha hu ye ye jo sare me jo mera wo hai catalog catalog bina chede is tarah se hoti nahi.
Executive: Sir dekho is cheez me jo bhi hai sari cheeze ek bar mai dikhwa deta hu waise to catalog ke sath to dekho agar mai sahi batau na aapko bina aapki permission ke jab tak mai hamare idhar se hum aapka catalog dekh sakte hai bina aapki uske jaise aapka catalog modify pata hai kab karte hai jab aapke aapka account hum chalaye hamare paas na access nahi rehta access rehta hai dekhne ka catalog ched chhad karne ka koi aisa nahi rehta ki usme kuch customize kar paye aap agar waha se apna dekho ek na aapke setting me ek option hoga ki kya kehte hai modify karne ka ek option ki catalog ko modify kar sakte hai nahi kar sakte agar wo aap hame option de doge ki hum isko modify kar de udhar se to hum jabhi isme kuch na kuch kar sakte hai uske baad hum kuch nahi kar sakte usme sir uske bina.
Customer: Catalog ek bar fir bhi aap suniye suniye aap jab bhi fir bhi keh rahe ho ek bar mai dekh leta hu agar aisa kuch hua hai to par mai isme jitna bhi mostly jo bhi changes hai jitna bhi kuch hai mai ek bar apni taraf se kar dunga maine isliye to aap tak aap se sham tak ka time manga tha maine kya to aapko bhi subah hi hamari baat hui thi ke bare me.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Nahi isme isme maine to maine to cheda nahi mere hisab se to.
Executive: Haan ji nahi nahi wo bhi aapki baat theek hai aapka concern theek hai jab aapne bol diya ki kya kehte hai bhai maine to kuch nahi cheda fir kharab kaise hui cheeze wo dekho wo aata hai dimag me par mai bhi aapko ye cheez bata du aapki permission ke bina hum catalog me koi ched chhad nahi kar sakte kyuki sari cheeze na activity status wagera sab dikh jate hai ki kisne aapka account open kiya sari cheeze hamare me dikh jati hai aisa koi koi kyu kharab karega log rishte sabko pyare hote hai na sir.
Customer: Haan ji pyar to hota hai par India mart pe kya hai ki customer ko disturb to karti hai yaani naye ke liye disturb fir naye naye jo jo grahak hai unko badhiya lead de rahi hai purane wale ko disturb kar diya.
Executive: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hota sir bylead dekho agar aapko bylead ka issue hai theek hai hamari us din bhi yahi baat hui thi aur bylead ka issue hai jald se jald isko mai solve karwaunga isiliye maine aaj aapki jitni bhi Kerala wagera location hai na isiliye isme not preferred wo kya kehte hai not relevant me mark karwai.
Executive: Jaise hi aapne not relevant wo location ko mark kiya to automatically location 24 ghante ke andar hat jayegi kyuki wo not preferred location me chali jayegi not preferred location ka matlab hai ki in location pe mai deal nahi karta.
Customer: Nahi to ye to chalo hat jayegi par mai jin locationo pe deal kar raha hu wo wo kaise hat gayi?
Executive: Wo to aapke catalog me.
Customer: Do saal se mai jin locationo pe.
Executive: Nahi aise to nahi hai ki na sari suniye suniye suniye sari aisa to nahi hai na sari ki sari location hat gayi hai location to abhi hai iska matlab ye to nahi hai ki sari ki sari aisa kuch ched chhad hui hai ki sabhi kuch hat gaya hai ya pura kuch hat gaya hai sari cheeze.
Executive: Theek hai aisa to kuch nahi hai par isme itna kar sakte hai sir hum ki aap mujhe thoda sa time dijiye thoda sa jaise aap mujhe time doge isme mai sari cheeze wo karke ek bar dekh ke mai aapko kar dunga aur bylead ke liye subah bhi maine aapke liye kam se kam 20 minute mai aapke sath call pe tha sari cheeze maine uske liye discuss bhi kari thi aapse.
Customer: Theek hai karwao sir isko.
Executive: Haan sir theek karwa deta hu suniye.
Customer: Karwao tabhi dikkat aayegi.
Executive: Haan abhi na isme ek kam karna padega abhi to dekho hamari kyuki already sab baat ho chuki hai to ticket ka to dekho isme mai aapko batau koi kam nahi hai sham tak ka mai wo aap aur ghar ja ke ek bar aur sari cheeze ek bar dekh lunga aur kal tak mai dekhunga dekho abhi jaise not preferred location me isko kara hai sari cheeze kari hai hello Kerala wagera jo bhi aapne location dali hai to wo 24 ghante time leta hai jaise ki kal ko apne aap hi wo not preferred location me add ho jayegi sari cheeze to us tak ka time do mujhe aur abhi iske abhi is ticket ko close kar du mai itne ke liye?
Customer: Kya hello mai keh raha hu abhi ke liye to ticket close kar du na sir mai.
Executive: Haan sir kar do bolo.
Executive: Haan sir wo feedback aayega aapke paas na ek mail pe.
Customer: Theek hai mai kar dunga.
Executive: Haan sir us pe kar dena aur jo bhi hamari cheeze hui hai baate hui hai wo tension mat lo ab mai isme thoda sa dhyan dunga sari cheeze mai ek bar provide karunga apni taraf se jitni mere pe mehsoos ho payegi mai karunga theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai best Bengal karna hai sir Maharashtra se Tamil Nadu total waha ki.
Executive: Sir mai tension mat lo aap jaise ki abhi dekh raha hu mai Maharashtra ki bhi aa rahi hai dusri Maharashtra ki aa rahi hai Goa ki aa rahi hai Maharashtra Maharashtra sahi sahi keh rahe ho aap Gujarat ki aa rahi hai.
Customer: Karnataka West Bengal.
Executive: Kyuki jaise ki hamari baat dekho almost ek saal ho gaya mai baat karte karte aapko bhi pata hai is cheez ka theek hai abhi isse pehle aapko jitni bhi dikkat aayi hai maine solve karke di hai aapko aapko bhi pata hai is cheez ka.
Customer: Time to time solve kar doge.
Executive: Haan aapko itna bhi is bar bhi mere pe thoda sa vishwas rakhna chahiye ki thoda sa.
Customer: Chalo aap kar dena aap dekh lo.
Executive: Bas to ek saal se agar mai sath hu aapke to sari cheeze bas us pe rakhiye aap India mart ko chodiye aap mere pe meri bhi to kuch wo hogi na agar mai kuch bol raha hu to.
Customer: Nahi nahi bilkul bilkul bilkul kar do.
Executive: Theek hai sir to aap na mai is ticket ko close kar raha hu feedback aayega aapko mail pe sir us pe jarur matlab jo bhi ho aapka satisfied ho satisfied jo bhi hai ha theek hai abhi kar dena sir mai abhi close karwa raha hu is ticket ko theek hai.
Customer: Okay sir okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving buyleads from unwanted locations.

- Catalog is being modified without permission.

- Customer is facing issues with buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve buylead issue.

- Executive explained catalog modification process.

- Executive marked unwanted locations as not relevant.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback on the mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, locations, subscription
